title: metaboData
text: Load library: example data sets stored remotely releases GitHub repository accessed using piggyback package. available data sets can viewed using: available metabolomic techniques can returned using: available data sets given metabolomic technique can returned using: particular data set can downloaded use : default stored within library location. behaviour can adjusted using dataSetDir internalDir arguments. File paths data files within given data set can returned using following: experimental description can retrieved given experiment given metabolomic technique using: Run information can retrieved given experiment given metabolomic technique using: filePaths, description runinfo, specified data set available locally, default user prompted consent downloading data. ask = FALSE argument can used override behaviour. abr1 FIE-MS data set FIEmspro package also available via lazy-load.
code: library(metaboData) availableDataSets() techniques() dataSets(techniques()[1]) downloadDataSet(techniques()[1],                 dataSets()[1]) files <- filePaths(     techniques()[1],     dataSets(techniques()[1])[1]) experimentDescription <- description(    techniques()[1],    dataSets(techniques()[1])[1]) info <- runinfo(     techniques()[1],     dataSets(techniques()[1])[1])  head(info)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jasen Finch. Author, maintainer. Manfred Beckmann. Contributor. David Enot. Contributor. Wanchang Lin. Contributor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Finch J (2022). metaboData: Example Metabolomics Data Sets. R package version 0.6.3, https://aberhrml.github.io/metaboData/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {metaboData: Example Metabolomics Data Sets},   author = {Jasen Finch},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.6.3},   url = {https://aberhrml.github.io/metaboData/}, }

title: Example Metabolomics Data Sets
text: Example data sets metabolomics analyses

title: Example Metabolomics Data Sets
text: package can install directly CRAN using following: Alternatively, development version can installed GitHub:

title: Example Metabolomics Data Sets
text: package documentation can browsed online https://aberHRML.github.io/metaboData/. first time using metaboData see vignette information get started. believe ’ve found bug metaboData, please file bug (, possible, reproducible example) https://github.com/aberHRML/metaboData/issues.

title: The abr1 dataset — abr1
text: Real world FIE-MS dataset.

title: The abr1 dataset — abr1
text: FIEmspro package https://github.com/aberHRML/FIEmspro

title: The abr1 dataset — abr1
text: list following elements: fact data frame containing experimental meta-data. pos data frame positive data 120 observations 2000 variables. neg data frame negative data 120 observations 2000 variables.

title: The abr1 dataset — abr1
text: FIE-MS data matrices developed analysis samples representing time course pathogen attack model plant species (Brachypodium distachyon).  data developed single batch samples randomised using Thermo LTQ linear ion trap processed using fiems_ltq_main. positive negative ion mode given (abr1$pos abr1$neg). avoid confusions, variable names given letter corresponding ionisation mode followed actual nominal mass value (e.g. P130 corresponds nominal mass 130 positive mode). Experimental factors given abr1$fact data frame: injorder: sample injection order name: sample name rep: biological replicate given class day: number days following infection sample harvested - Level H corresponds healthy plant. class: identical day except class=6 day=H pathcdf,filecdf,name.org,remark: generated profile processing kept traceability purposes. Factor interest classification contained abr1$fact$day.  20 biological replicates class

title: The abr1 dataset — abr1
text: Manfred Beckmann, David Enot Wanchang Lin

title: The abr1 dataset — abr1
code: # Load data set data(abr1)  # Select data set dat <- abr1$neg  # number of observations and variables in the negative mode matrix dim(dat) #> [1]  120 2000  # names of the variables dimnames(dat)[[2]] %>%   head() #> [1] "N1" "N2" "N3" "N4" "N5" "N6"  # print out the experimental factors abr1$fact %>%   head() #>   injorder                              pathcdf filecdf name.org remark name #> 1        1 C:/Xcalibur/ANDI-LTQ/050509-Abr1/cdf  01.cdf     12_2     ok 12_2 #> 2        2 C:/Xcalibur/ANDI-LTQ/050509-Abr1/cdf  02.cdf     13_3     ok 13_4 #> 3        3 C:/Xcalibur/ANDI-LTQ/050509-Abr1/cdf  03.cdf     15_4     ok 15_5 #> 4        4 C:/Xcalibur/ANDI-LTQ/050509-Abr1/cdf  04.cdf     12_1     ok 12_2 #> 5        5 C:/Xcalibur/ANDI-LTQ/050509-Abr1/cdf  05.cdf     12_2     ok 12_2 #> 6        6 C:/Xcalibur/ANDI-LTQ/050509-Abr1/cdf  06.cdf     11_1     ok 11_2 #>   rep day class #> 1   2   2     2 #> 2   3   3     3 #> 3   5   4     4 #> 4   2   1     1 #> 5   2   2     2 #> 6   1   1     1  # check out the repartition of class table(abr1$fact$class) #>  #>  1  2  3  4  5  6  #> 20 20 20 20 20 20

title: Available data sets — availableDataSets
text: Displays available data sets.

title: Available data sets — availableDataSets
text: dataSetDir directory containing local data set store. internalDir = TRUE full directory path relative package installation location. internalDir stored data set internally package installation location

text: tibble containing available data set information.

title: Download a data set — downloadDataSet

title: metaboData 0.6.3
text: Removed malformed email addresses abr1 data set documentation.

title: metaboData 0.6.2
text: CRAN release: 2021-08-20 Fixes package description CRAN submission.

title: metaboData 0.6.1
text: Added Manfred Beckmann, David Enot Wanchang Lin package contributors. Added return values documentation metaboData::downloadFiles() metaboData::downloadDataSet().

title: metaboData 0.6.0
text: Fix error caused destination directory data downloads exist. Added metaboData::availableFiles() view available files given data set. Added metaboData::downloadFiles() download specific files given data set. magrittr::%>% now re-exported.

title: metaboData 0.5.1
text: metaboData::filePaths() now returns file paths .mzML files.

title: metaboData 0.5.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added RP-UHPLC-HRMS Brachypodium distachyon ecotype comparison data set. Data sets now available remotely available download using metaboData::downloadDataSet().
